notes.title: Overview
notes.text:
MercuryTrade is an overlay application for Path of Exile. It's designed to facilitate all possible trading interactions in the game providing a much better user experience for the players. This one minute overview will cover other features as well. 
All the future updates will be available for download from within this application. 

MercuryTrade is 100% legit: no macros, no injectors!

notes.title: Main feature: Notification (1/2)
notes.text:
When you receive a trade related message this notification panel pops up. It has all the information you might need to make a decision. 

Let's take a look.

notes.title: Main feature: Response buttons
notes.text:
Response buttons are fully customizable in settings. 
Select an already existing button (or create a new one) -> label it -> write in your message.

notes.title: Minor feature: Accessibility status
notes.text: MercuryTrade notifications have an indication for when a person comes in or leaves your hideout - that way you can trade with players as soon as possible (and keep track of them all!). Especially useful because in-game stash UI takes priority over party frames.

notes.title: Main feature: History
notes.text:
Each notification you receive is stored by MercuryTrade in a separate file. 

You won't be losing potential trades due to client crashes or relogs anymore!

notes.title: Minor feature: Chat Scanner
notes.text:
MercuryTrade features a real-time Chat Scanner. 
All the messages with matching words will be displayed in a separate window - no need to strain your eyes looking for a Trial anymore!

notes.title: Minor feature: "SuperTrade" mode
notes.text:
By default (on the left) each consecutive notification you receive is folded to save screen space. SuperTrade mode is a switch that will force notification panels to be fully displayed. 
Easier to manage multiple trades at once if needed.

notes.title: Minor feature: "Do not Disturb" mode
notes.text: Activate this mode if you don't want to see (and hear!) anything from the application for a while. The messages will continue to be stored in your History for later access.

notes.title: Settings
notes.text: Tailor "Automatic notification fading", "Transparency levels" and "Sound alerts" to your taste.

notes.title: Feedback and Suggestions
notes.text:
MercuryTrade
